label: Theft / bypass suspicion
description: Unexpected drop or bypass pattern; possible meter tampering.

label: Meter malfunction / stuck readings
description: Repeated identical or zero variance over multiple periods.

label: Network anomaly (local cluster spike)
description: Cluster-wide spike or drop affecting multiple MPANs.

label: Maintenance needed (drift / repeated outliers)
